EmailTemplate.description: Sent to participants for 70 Day Pulse Check from Onboarding Class start date
EmailTemplate.name: 11.1 Onboarding 70 Day Pulse Check Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Tell Us About Your Learning Journey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
70 Day Pulse check on your Sales Learning Journey
An important part of your Learning Journey is to identify any obstacles in your path to success, discuss a plan to overcome those obstacles and close any gaps that will detour your ramping success.
Please follow this link to complete the 70-Day Pulse Check Survey with in 5 days. https://wex.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_07lNbVE3DtP8tr7
I'll review and reachout to schedule any Gap Training if needed.
Thank you,
WEX Global Sales Training
